com.example.cshare.ui.views

Class BaseFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.cshare.ui.views.BaseFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProductListFragment, ProfileFragment

    public abstract class BaseFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    Abstract BaseFragment class, inheriting from the Fragment class, within which the most frequently used methods are redefined.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Clara Gros
    See Also:
    Fragment

      • observeDataChanges

        protected abstract void observeDataChanges()
        Calls the public methods of our ViewModel to observe their results.

        For the Get methods, we used the observe() method to be automatically alerted if the database result changes.
